attributes.background: Talk about the consequences of Brexit and what it has done to the economy, the people and tourists abroad.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about Brexit but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a petition for the Government to commission a review to look at the case for re-joining the EU, if that is what you would like.

You may wish to sign the following petition:

Hold a referendum on re-joining the European Union
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648807
